Ask HN: What's Neat in Your Field?
text:
It's amazing what science and engineering have accomplished. But unless you are in a field, you may not know what is possible. What's neat in your field that might make someone else go, "Wow, I didn't know we could do that."?

Prompted by the Ultra Sonic Lens cleaning article submitted here: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=34426600

Show HN: One Click Tourist Visa Applications
text: Hi HN! I am curious for your feedback on whether a one click tourist visa application service is something you would use! Is the messaging and communication clear on the page? Feedback and discussion more than welcome.

title: Ask HN: What have you built more than twice and wish someone had built for you?
text:
For me, I'm building workspaces and sharing capabilities for the third time at a different company.

I would convince my boss to pay for a service that provided easy-to-use React components and implemented all the flows for inviting users to workspace, share by email or link, list who can access a resource, send invitation emails, etc, so I could focus on the damn app!
